sub_title: Heineken Brand Ambassador | MSc Political Science @ Universiteit Leiden
summary:
Recently graduated from a MSc in International Politics from Leiden University and a MA in East European Studies from the University of Amsterdam, I have dedicated my academic career to understanding regional and international mechanisms of Russo-Ukrainian, and Asia-Pacific security issues (China & North Korea).

I have also advocated for better drug education and reform, mental health, gender equity and sustainability in activism in both Canada and the Netherlands. I aim to carry these values and perspectives to diplomacy and policymaking. 

Through my education, extracurriculars and professional experiences, I have learnt how to collaborate and communicate effectively, as well as manage interdisciplinary projects. I am currently interested in working towards conflict resolution in the Post-Soviet World as well as deepening my involvement in drug policy and education in the Netherlands and the EU.

My responsibilities include but are not limited to:
-Managing VoxCann's social media platform including Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and Twitter. 

-Contacting education professionals around the Island of Montreal and Quebec to promote our education platform as well as following up after the workshops to register improvement following our workshop.

-My interest in economics also makes me capable to analyze and study the cannabis market, its possibilities and adapt our platform to be as innovative, modern and up-to-date as possible.
